sentences.sContent: And go for a ride on a glider airplane, because who says planes need motors?
sentences.sContent_eng: And go for a ride on a glider airplane, because who says planes need motors?
sentences.sCn: 她会去坐滑翔机，因为没人说过飞机一定要有发动机吧？

sentences.sContent: The huge, showy booster rockets fallen away, it was just a little glider or an aeroplane.
sentences.sContent_eng: The huge, showy booster rockets fallen away, it was just a little glider or an aeroplane.
sentences.sCn: 巨大显眼的助推火箭脱离后，它看上去只是架小型滑翔机或飞机。

sentences.sContent: He said that if both engines of the plane had failed, the aircraft would become like a "glider".
sentences.sContent_eng: He said that if both engines of the plane had failed, the aircraft would become like a "glider".
sentences.sCn: 他说，如果飞机的两个引擎都已经停转的话，飞机就像一架“滑翔机。”

words.tran: 滑翔；滑行；悄悄地走；消逝

trans.tranOther: a light plane that flies without an engine
